@Override
    public void onBackPressed() {
        App.log("back");
        App.toast("back");
        super.onBackPressed();
    }


¼àÌý²¢À¹½Ø£º
@Override
    public void onBackPressed() {
        App.log("back");
        App.toast("back");
        //super.onBackPressed();
    }

»ò

@Override
    public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        if (keyCode == event.KEYCODE_BACK) {
            App.toast("ºóÍË¼ü");
            App.log("ºóÍË¼ü");
            return false;
        }
return super.onKeyDown(keyCode, event);
    }
